description.company: Founded in 2013 by French entrepreneur Xavier Niel, 42 is a disruptive school that takes an innovative approach to training software engineers. With a methodology based on peer-to-peer learning (P2P), students face projects and challenges collaboratively, promoting both individual development and an entrepreneurial mindset.
Garrafa no Mar is an app designed to help people in financially vulnerable situations pay their bills through anonymous donations.
Advanced Outdoor Solutions is a management and consulting company for outdoor hospitality properties, offering everything from park planning and design to complete management solutions.
description.job: We developed the site responsively in WordPress with Oxygen Builder, following the design defined by the agency.
